case_address_found_1: Two miles past the Smith Ranch traveling away from Eloy
case_circumstances: Migrant walking with group in remote desert area became unresponsive, a passerby picked him up and brought him to Eloy.  The decedent was taken to Casa Grande Regional Medical Center where he expired.  The group nicknamed the decedent "Chapo" (because he was short in stature).
case_facial_hair: 1/4 inch mustache and beard in a goatee distribution
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered

Black belt, "Boss" brand (see image of pants)
